mapper.sql: id, input_date, general_member_count, general_member_rebuy, senior_member_count, senior_member_rebuy, gold_member_count, gold_member_rebuy
mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL( SUM( IFNULL(general_member_count,0) + IFNULL(senior_member_count,0)+IFNULL(gold_member_count,0)),0) FROM `member`
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(general_member_count,0))AS s1,SUM(IFNULL(general_member_rebuy,0))AS s2,SUM(IFNULL(senior_member_count,0))AS s3,SUM(IFNULL(senior_member_rebuy,0))AS s4,SUM(gold_member_count)AS s5,SUM(IFNULL(gold_member_rebuy,0))AS s6 FROM `member`

select
distinct
from member
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT count(1) as registerCount, IFNULL(SUM(CASE source_name WHEN '门户' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ),0) as doorCount, IFNULL(SUM(CASE source_name WHEN '后台' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ),0) AS backStageCount, IFNULL(SUM(CASE level_name WHEN '普通会员' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ),0) AS generalCount, IFNULL(SUM(CASE source_name WHEN '高级会员' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ),0) AS seniorCount FROM erui_buyer.v_buyer where 1=1
and created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")

SELECT a.registerInq ,b.registerOrd FROM ( SELECT COUNT(inq.quotation_num) AS inqCount FROM inquiry_count AS inq WHERE 1=1
and rollin_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")
and inq.cust_description IN (SELECT buyer_code FROM erui_buyer.v_buyer WHERE 1=1
and created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")
) ) AS a ,
( SELECT COUNT(ord.execute_num) AS ordCount FROM order_count AS ord WHERE 1=1
and project_start BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")
and ord.cust_description IN (SELECT buyer_code FROM erui_buyer.v_buyer WHERE 1=1
and created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")
) ) AS b
mapper.insert:
insert into member
id,
input_date,
general_member_count,
general_member_rebuy,
senior_member_count,
senior_member_rebuy,
gold_member_count,
gold_member_rebuy,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{inputDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{generalMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{generalMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{seniorMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{seniorMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goldMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goldMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update member
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
input_date = #{record.inputDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
general_member_count = #{record.generalMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
general_member_rebuy = #{record.generalMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
senior_member_count = #{record.seniorMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
senior_member_rebuy = #{record.seniorMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gold_member_count = #{record.goldMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gold_member_rebuy = #{record.goldMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update member set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, input_date = #{record.inputDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, general_member_count = #{record.generalMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, general_member_rebuy = #{record.generalMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, senior_member_count = #{record.seniorMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, senior_member_rebuy = #{record.seniorMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gold_member_count = #{record.goldMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gold_member_rebuy = #{record.goldMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update member
input_date = #{inputDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
general_member_count = #{generalMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
general_member_rebuy = #{generalMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
senior_member_count = #{seniorMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
senior_member_rebuy = #{seniorMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gold_member_count = #{goldMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gold_member_rebuy = #{goldMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update member set input_date = #{inputDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, general_member_count = #{generalMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, general_member_rebuy = #{generalMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, senior_member_count = #{seniorMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, senior_member_rebuy = #{seniorMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gold_member_count = #{goldMemberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gold_member_rebuy = #{goldMemberRebuy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
